value:
You got a Resplendent Hero
 as a Feh Pass benefit!

You got Resplendent Attire
 as a Feh Pass benefit!

You have a voucher that you can
exchange for a Resplendent Hero.

$aThe Resplendent Attire donned by
Resplendent Hero $a0.

A voucher that can be exchanged for
a Resplendent Hero.

Do you want to restart your turn?

(If no Hero has acted, you will
return to the start of the previous
turn. Otherwise, you will return to
the start of the current turn.)

Do you want to restart your turn?

(If no Hero has acted, you will
return to the start of the previous
turn. Otherwise, you will return to
the start of the current turn.)

Do you want to return to when
Light's Blessing was used?

Use 1 Light's Blessing? This will:
・Revive any fallen allies
・Restore HP
・Enable allies to move
・Enable use of Specials

Note: If Light's Blessing is used on
your turn and you use the Re-Act
Feh Pass perk after acting (or at
the beginning of the next turn),
you will be returned to the instant
after the Light's Blessing usage.
If the Light's Blessing is used on a
foe's turn, the Re-Act perk will
instead return you to the start of
the current turn.

Redeem 1 Orb? This will:
・Revive any fallen allies
・Restore HP
・Enable allies to move
・Enable use of Specials

Note: If Orbs are used to revive on
your turn and you use the Re-Act
Feh Pass perk after acting (or at
the beginning of the next turn),
you will be returned to the instant
after the Orbs were used. If the
Orbs are used on a foe's turn, the
Re-Act perk will instead return
you to the beginning of the
current turn.

Enjoy special subscriber benefits
with Feh Pass!

Access to subscription benefits will
be refreshed on a monthly basis.
◆ Please read the entirety of the scrolling text.
This Resplendent Hero will join you.

You can collect various rewards
from special subscriber quests.

You can form Summoner Support
bonds with up to three Heroes.

You can return to the start of a turn,
or to the start of the previous turn if
no Heroes have acted. (This perk
functions only on certain maps.)

You can play the same map multiple
times in a row, automatically. (This
perk functions only on certain maps.)

・ You will lose access to these benefits if your
Feh Pass subscription expires.

・ Your Feh Pass subscription will be renewed
automatically each month, refreshing your Feh
Pass subscription benefits, unless you cancel it
at least 24 hours before your subscription is
set to renew.
・ If you cancel your Feh Pass subscription,
you will still be able to access all the benefits
of a Feh Pass until they refresh.
・ If you change to a new device that has a
different OS than your current device, your
subscription cannot be transferred. Please
cancel your previous subscription before
starting a subscription on the new device.
・ You can collect Resplendent Heroes by
logging in during their distribution period.
・ If you subscribe to Feh Pass near the end
of a Resplendent Hero's distribution period,
please ensure there is enough time in their
distribution period for you to collect them.
・ If you do not cancel automatic renewal at
least 24 hours before your subscription is set
to refresh, your Feh Pass subscription will
be automatically renewed.
・ See the FAQ for more information on how
to check the validity period of your Feh Pass
subscription or to cancel automatic renewal.

Returning to the Shop because
your Feh Pass subscription status
changed. To restore your Feh
Pass access, tap Restore Feh Pass.

This Resplendent Attire is exclusively for
the Hero above. Purchase includes one
summon of this Hero, who will wear this
Resplendent Attire automatically.

Redeem a Resplendent
Hero Voucher to purchase
a Resplendent Hero?

The combination of save data and
Apple ID in use now does not
match the combination used to
subscribe to Feh Pass. Do you
want to restore access to Feh
Pass benefits on this save data?

The combination of save data and
Google Account in use now does
not match the combination used
to subscribe to Feh Pass. Do you
want to restore access to Feh
Pass benefits on this save data?

◆ Information on restoring Feh Pass
benefits to the Apple ID and save
data used to subscribe can be found
in the FAQ.

◆ Information on restoring Feh Pass
benefits to the Google Account and
save data used to subscribe can be
found in the FAQ.

・ The save data you used to access
Feh Pass previously will no longer be
able to access Feh Pass benefits.
・ You will be unable to use Restore
Feh Pass again for a set time period.

Restored Feh Pass benefits to
this save data.

$aCould not restore Feh Pass benefits.

Note: Feh Pass access cannot be
restored using this save data until
$a0.

This Apple ID cannot be used to
restore Feh Pass access because
it has no associated Feh Pass.

For information on subscribing to
Feh Pass or restoring Feh Pass
benefits, refer to the FAQ.

This Google Account cannot be
used to restore Feh Pass access
because it has no associated
Feh Pass.

For information on subscribing to
Feh Pass or restoring Feh Pass
benefits, refer to the FAQ.

Unable to restore your access to
Feh Pass subscription benefits.

For more information, refer to
the "I cannot restore Feh Pass
privileges" section of the FAQ.

You can use the Auto-Start perk if
you have a Feh Pass subscription.
You can learn more in the Shop.

Your Feh Pass subscription has
expired. You must have an active
subscription to enjoy access to
the benefits of Feh Pass.

◆ If you do not renew your Feh Pass
subscription, you will no longer have
access to the benefits of Feh Pass.

Without a subscription, you will lose
access to the benefits of Feh Pass.
Continue without subscribing?

Could not verify your subscription
status because the Apple ID used
to subscribe to Feh Pass and the
save data in use do not match.

You may be able to restore access
to Feh Pass benefits by tapping the
Restore Feh Pass button in the Shop.

Could not verify your subscription
status because the Google Account
used to subscribe to Feh Pass and
the save data in use do not match.

You may be able to restore access
to Feh Pass benefits by tapping the
Restore Feh Pass button in the Shop.

Could not verify your subscription
status because you already have a
subscription to Feh Pass through
the Google Play Store.

The game will now start with access
to Feh Pass benefits disabled.

Could not verify your subscription
status because you already have a
subscription to Feh Pass through
the App Store.

The game will now start with access
to Feh Pass benefits disabled.

Could not subscribe because
your Feh Pass subscription
status changed. To restore your
access, tap Restore Feh Pass.

The subscription process could
not be completed due to a
communications error.

You cannot subscribe to Feh Pass
on this device because a Feh Pass
subscription through the Google Play
Store is still active on this save data.
Please try again once the Feh Pass
subscription through the Google Play
Store has expired.

You cannot subscribe to Feh Pass
on this device because a Feh Pass
subscription through the App Store
is still active on this save data.
Please try again once the Feh Pass
subscription through the App Store
has expired.

$aSupporting an ally will boost their
stats. Do you want to support
$a0 and $a1?

$aSupporting an ally will boost their
stats. Please confirm support for
the following allies:
・ $a0
・ $a1
・ $a2

There are no Heroes to form a new
Summoner Support bond with.

You may change which ally you're
supporting, but doing so will reset
the Support Rank with your current
ally. Proceed anyway?

・ If you change which ally you're
supporting, the Support Rank with
your current ally will reset.

・ If you are not subscribed to Feh
Pass, then you can support only one
ally at a time.

・ If you change which ally you're
supporting, the Support Rank with
your current ally will reset.
・ If you are not subscribed to Feh
Pass, then you can support only
one ally at a time.
This Hero can wear Resplendent Attire.

This reward requires a Feh Pass
subscription to be collected.
Do you want to check the Shop?

With a Feh Pass subscription, you
can form up to three Summoner
Support bonds with Heroes.
Do you want to check the Shop?

You do not have Resplendent
Attire for this Hero yet. Do you
want to check the Shop?

You have not collected any
Resplendent Attire. You must
have a Feh Pass subscription
obtain Resplendent Attire. Do
you want to check the Shop?

Expanded Summoner Support:
While you have an active Feh
Pass subscription, you can form
Summoner Support bonds with
up to three Heroes.

Resplendent Attire:
When a Hero dons Resplendent
Attire, their appearance and voice
lines will change.

Resplendent Hero Effects:
Resplendent Heroes are granted
HP/Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2.

(The bonuses will persist even
when the Hero is not wearing
their Resplendent Attire.)
